post:
Ready2Frag  -  Performance Gaming, Dedicated, and Virtual Solutions​

​
Ready2Frag was founded primarily as a gaming company. While we're only a few months old, we have decided to expand our services to high-performance KVM VPS hosting. We have decided to offer these great VPSs at some great prices to help promote our services.​

​


Who We Are, and What We Do:
 
Ready2Frag, operating under a DBA of HostVenom, LLC., exists only to offer fair-priced and high-performance hosting solutions on company-owned and colocated hardware. With dedicated tech and support staff, we are ready to offer a secure and easy-to-use hosting experience for our clients.
 
Even with the awesome $12 / GB promotional price on these VPSs, our primary focus has been awesome performance. We have opted to use Enterprise-class Supermicro chassis, Intel Xeon E3-1230v2 processors, Super Talent or Kingston DDR3 ECC RAM, 250GB Samsung 840 Evo SSDs, and LSI hardware RAID (9271-4i).
 
We currently offer hosting services in Chicago, IL. Our Chicago services are located in our own suite within the Steadfast Networks 725 S. Wells facility in downtown Chicago. Inbound traffic is routed through GigeNET's premium network for provider-level DDoS Protection, while outbound is routed through Steadfast's own blend.
 

 
Features Offered:
  • SolusVM Control Panel (SSL Enabled)
  • 1Gbps Network Ports (Fair-Share Basis)
  • Automated Setup
  • DDoS Protection (4Gbps 4 MPPS) included FREE!
